Types

ClapHostLog = object
  log*: proc (host: ptr ClapHost; severity: ClapLogSeverity; msg: cstring): void {.
      cdecl.}

ClapHostThreadCheck = object
  is_main_thread*: proc (host: ptr ClapHost): bool {.cdecl.}
  is_audio_thread*: proc (host: ptr ClapHost): bool {.cdecl.}

ClapLogSeverity {.size: 4.} = enum
  clsDEBUG = 0, clsINFO = 1, clsWARNING = 2, clsERROR = 3, clsFATAL = 4,
  clsHOST_MISBEHAVING = 5, clsPLUGIN_MISBEHAVING = 6
